result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ بِغَيۡرِ مَا ٱكۡتَسَبُواْ فَقَدِ ٱحۡتَمَلُواْ بُهۡتَٰنٗا وَإِثۡمٗا مُّبِينٗا
result.translation: Na barya babangamira abemeramana n’abemeramanakazi mu mvugo n’ingiro, babahora icaha batigeze bakora, ni ukuri biremeka ikinyoma ceruye hamwe n’icaha kigaragara bazohanirwa mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa.
